Utilizes public statements to contest the film's inaccuracies, attempting to undermine the film’s credibility proactively.
Despite prolonged detention and legal challenges, maintained political asylum to avoid unjust charges, indicating strategic and knowledgeable handling of his situation.
No direct action shown in preventing mischaracterization by the film makers or controlling the film’s message before release.
